mmcif_pdbx_v42.description: A prior version of the PDB Exchange Data dictionary frozen at version 4.073

mmcif_pdbx_v40.description: A prior version of the PDB Exchange Data dictionary frozen at version 4.073

mmcif_pdbx_v32.description: A prior version of the PDB exchange data dictionary frozen at version 1.0697

mmcif_pdbx_v31.description: An early version of the PDB exchange data dictionary frozen at version 1.0524

mmcif_std.title: mmCIF Dictionary
mmcif_std.developers: IUCr working group:  Paula M. Fitzgerald, Helen Berman,Phil Bourne, Brian McMahon, Keith Watenpaugh, and John Westbrook

mmcif_ddl.title: DDL2 Dictionary
mmcif_ddl.description: Dictionary Description Language Version 2 supporting mmCIF and PDB Exchange Dictionary (PDBx/mmCIF)

mmcif_sas.title: Small Angle Scattering Dictionary
mmcif_sas.description: Draft data definitions for small-angle scattering applications
mmcif_sas.maintainers: wwPDB Small Angle Scattering Task Force

mmcif_nef.title: NMR Exchange Format Dictionary
mmcif_nef.description: Draft data definitions for NMR exchange format definitions

mmcif_em.title: 3DEM Extension Dictionary
mmcif_em.description: Community extension data dictionary describing 3D EM structure and experimental data to be deposited in the EMDB and PDB archives.

mmcif_nmr-star.title: NMRSTAR Dictionary
mmcif_nmr-star.description: PDBx/mmCIF translation of the NMRSTAR data dictionary developed by the BioMagResBank

mmcif_img.title: imgCIF/CBF Extension Dictionary
mmcif_img.description: Extension to the mmCIF dictionary describing image data collection and compact binary representation of diffraction image data
mmcif_img.developers: Andy Hammersley, Herbert J. Bernstein, I. David Brown, and John Westbrook

mmcif_biosync.title: BIOSYNC Extension Dictionary
mmcif_biosync.description: Extension to the mmCIF dictionary describing the features of synchrotron facilities and beamlines

mmcif_mdb.title: MDB Modeling Extension Dictionary
mmcif_mdb.description: Extension to the mmCIF dictionary describing homology models and homology modeling methodologies

mmcif_ccp4.title: CCP4 Harvest Extension Dictionary
mmcif_ccp4.description: Data dictionary developed for harvesting data from applications within the CCP4 system
mmcif_ccp4.developers: CCP4 in collaboration with Kim Henrick.

mmcif_rcsb_nmr.title: RCSB PDB NMR Internal Data Dictionary
mmcif_rcsb_nmr.description: Data dictionary used by RCSB PDB for internal data processing and annotation operations

mmcif_rcsb_xray.title: RCSB PDB X-Ray Internal Data Dictionary
mmcif_rcsb_xray.description: Data dictionary used by RCSB PDB for internal data processing and annotation operations

mmcif_ihm_ext.title: IHMCIF extension dictionary
mmcif_ihm_ext.description: The IHMCIF dictionary is an extension of the PDBx/mmCIF dictionary. This dictionary is actively developed and maintained in a github repository available at https://github.com/ihmwg/IHMCIF. Integrative structures that are compliant to this extension dictionary can be deposited to the PDB-Dev prototype deposition and archiving system (https://pdb-dev.wwpdb.org).
mmcif_ihm_ext.developers: wwPDB integrative/hybrid methods task force members
mmcif_ihm_ext.maintainers: wwPDB integrative/hybrid methods task force members

mmcif_ihm_flr_ext.title: flrCIF extension dictionary
mmcif_ihm_flr_ext.description: The flrCIF dictionary is an extension of the PDBx/mmCIF and IHMCIF dictionaries. This dictionary is actively developed and maintained in a github repository available at https://github.com/ihmwg/flrCIF. flrCIF provides the data representation for capturing the details of Fluorescence / FRET experiments. The restraints derived from these experiments can be combined with spatial restraints from other experiments to determine the structures of macromolecular assemblies using integrative modeling methods. The integrative structures are archived in the PDB-Dev prototype system (https://pdb-dev.wwpdb.org).
mmcif_ihm_flr_ext.developers: wwPDB integrative/hybrid methods task force members
mmcif_ihm_flr_ext.maintainers: wwPDB integrative/hybrid methods task force members

mmcif_ndb_ntc.title: NDB NTC Dictionary
mmcif_ndb_ntc.description: The NDB NTC dictionary is an extension of the PDBx/mmCIF dictionary for DNATCO conformer analysis of nucleic acids.
mmcif_ndb_ntc.developers: Brinda Vallat, Cathy Lawson, Bohdan Schneider, and Jiri Cerny

mmcif_ma.title: ModelCIF Extension Dictionary
mmcif_ma.description: ModelCIF is an extension of the PDBx/mmCIF dictionary. This resource is actively developed and maintained at the ModelCIF GitHub respository available at https://github.com/ihmwg/ModelCIF.

mmcif_pdbx_vrpt.title: wwPDB Validation Report Dictionary
mmcif_pdbx_vrpt.description: wwPDB validation report data in PDBx/mmCIF format
